Ok
act: smelt from slot 25 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a diorite slab, I need to first craft two diorites. A diorite requires placing one cobblestone between two quartz blocks. Since there are no quartz blocks in the inventory, I will first need to smelt some nether quartz ore. But before that, I need to place the cobblestone in the center of the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the cobblestone from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
